recommendations.description: Vipul is very hard-working and addicted to technology. Every manager in our organization wants him on board. You give him one task and he will come back with five solutions. He is one of the top performer in the company. Above all that he is very simple and modest, ready to help round the clock.
recommendations.relation: Vineet worked directly with Vipul at AddNode India Pvt Ltd

recommendations.description: I worked with Vipul for almost a year and during this period we worked on 3-4 projects in same team. Vipul is very talented and technically sound in PLM domain. He comes with good ideas and focus on end delivery. He did excellent job in not only in developement but also suugested test cases for QA team. I always enjoyed working with him and wish all the very best for future endeavors.

I have got a chance to manage a team comprising of relatively lesser experienced members. Being a challenging project from business perspective I was bit concerned about the team formation. However my concerns were short-lived once results started to come in. Vipul was one of those team members who despite of being a newbie learned the technologies quickly and delivered beyond the limits. He played a role of all-rounder in the team as and when project demanded. Vipul, instead of being reactive, is a proactive person who setups benchmarks for fellow team members in terms of learning, productivity, process compliance etc. He is a very easy going person who believes in helping his team members and raises team spirits to new heights. His ability to accept new responsibilities and adapt to the situations is praiseworthy.I see a bright future in front of him and wish all the best.
recommendations.relation: Mahesh managed Vipul at Geometric Ltd
